summary.overview: Complete medical professional suite with bedside assistant, nurse station dashboard, FHIR R4 integration, real-time vitals monitoring, and fall detection. Designed for HIPAA compliance and optimized for Raspberry Pi deployment in clinical settings.
summary.exampleUseCase: A nurse receives a fall alert on the multi-room dashboard, immediately video-calls the patient via the bedside kiosk, and documents the incident using FHIR-compliant intake forms - all within EVE's unified interface.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Unlike cloud-dependent solutions, this runs locally for data sovereignty. The Lite viewport ensures 24 FPS on Raspberry Pi hardware. Six-language terminology support and automatic network discovery make deployment frictionless across facilities.

author: Hermetic Labs
features: Raspberry Pi optimized (24 FPS, merged geometry)
